page.content: this are inccludes almost two-thirds the island poulation (130 in all) also both churches, the school, most crofts, best loch fishing, island road system, the harbour and pier, the coup, the doctor, shop-post ofice-petrol pump, two farms, and the island hotel - the latter employs up to 15 people in season and is the single largest employer. A home-improvement scheme has jut been complted, the total imput amounting to over Â£50,000 per house and securing the future of the island for the foreseeable future.
